branchCategory.name: ISE1, Pressure Switch, 1 or 2 Outputs with Analog, LED Indicator
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE1 is a basic pressure switch with digital output and optional analog voltage output.  The ISE1 monitors the pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  Low and high pressure ranges are offered, as well as metric or NPTF male thread connections.  Rotary trimmers adjust the switch set point and variable hysteresis if 1 output, or two set point trimmers if 2 output.  A red/green LED indicator also lights when the output signal is ON.  Electrical connections include a 3 wire grommet cable or 4 wire snap-in connector.  ISE1 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE1, Pressure Switch, 1 or 2 Outputs with Analog, LED Indicator
